Uses of Interface
com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core.Guard

Packages that use Guard
com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core   
 

Uses of Guard in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core
 

Classes in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core that implement Guard
 class EventTypeGuard
          Defines a guard that accepts an event if it is an instance of the type supplied when this guard is created.
 class NegationGuard
          Defines a guard that wraps another guard and negates the result of the accept() method call.
 class PositiveGuard
          Defines a guard that always accepts the proffered event.
 class RegexGuard
          Defines a guard that accepts an event if its object is a string that matches the regular expression supplied with the guard.
 

Methods in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core that return Guard
 Guard Transition.getGuard()
           
 

Methods in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core with parameters of type Guard
 Transition StateTransitionMap.addTransition(java.lang.String name, Guard guard, State input, Action action, State output)
          Adds a new transition to the map.
 void StateTransitionMap.addTransitionGroup(java.lang.String name, Guard guard, java.util.Set<State> states, Action action)
          Adds a group of transitions to the map that share the same guard and action and that have the same input and output state.
 void StateTransitionMap.addTransitionGroup(java.lang.String name, Guard guard, State[] states, Action action)
          Adds a group of transitions to the map that share the same guard and action and that have the same input and output state.
 

Constructors in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core with parameters of type Guard
NegationGuard(Guard guard)
          Creates a new instance.
Transition(Guard guard, State input, Action action, State output)
          Creates a new transition instance with a default name "_TO_"
Transition(java.lang.String name, Guard guard, State input, Action action, State output)
          Creates a new transition instance.
